name: Puzzle And Dragons X
description: In PADX, you can create and collect your favorite NFT art avatars that can be used in metaverse! You can also barter with your nfts, buy some exclusive NFTs and trade it with others, meet and interact with each other in Metaverse! We are also adding a feature that you can create your own shop in metaverse to sell your NFTs , assests and services!
